articles.title: Kim Jong Un Inspects Artillery Company under KPA Unit 963
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Inspects Artillery Company under KPA Unit 963
 Pyongyang, December 2 (KCNA) -- Supreme Commander of the Korean People's Army Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea and first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK, Monday inspected the Artillery Company under KPA Unit 963 which started the new year combat and political drill.
					 He, to begin with, watched a specialized training of soldiers at a lecture room.
					
					 Hearing in detail questions and answers between trainer and soldiers and conversing with them, he taught ways of making the company the one of crackshots by conducting the drill suited to the nature of its combat duty.
					
					 He set forth important tasks for successfully conducting the new year combat and political drill.
					
					 He underscored the need to fully prepare all service personnel of the People's Army as stalwart fighters equipped with the ever-victorious Kim Il Sung-Kim Jong Il strategy and tactics, brave offensive methods and perfect real war capability and help them take on the appearance of the powerful elite revolutionary army by thoroughly carrying out the four-point strategic line and three major tasks for bolstering the military capability.
					
					 He said that all commanding officers and soldiers should bear deep in mind the slogan of faith "Do not abandon the revolutionary faith though one may die" and prepare themselves as vanguard fighters strong in faith advancing with arms in the one direction only as indicated by the party by sincerely taking part in all political lectures.
					
					 He gave an instruction to conduct various forms of intensive combat drills including specialized training under the simulated conditions of an actual war in order to help soldiers have perfect mastery of their weapons and combat and technical equipment and train them as crackshots.
					
					 He also underlined the need to intensify heavy gymnastics training among soldiers so that they may have strong physical bodies.
					
					  All commanding officers should always find themselves among the soldiers of the company, take warm care of their living as their parents would do and settle in time the problems arising in their drills and military service so that they may devote themselves to drills only, he said.
					
					 He underlined the need to make the hearts of all the service personnel burn with a single desire to perform proud distinguished military merits in the drive for implementing the training order by conducting an ideological offensive as required by the prevailing situation in order to bring about collective innovations in combat and political drills.
					
					 He looked round the newly built barracks of the company.
					
					In order to turn the company into a dear native home of its soldiers, it is necessary to provide them with warm beds and hearty meal and, at the same time, make warm feelings prevail in the company, he said, calling for making sure that the company is pervaded with such traits of revolutionary comradeship as officers and men helping and leading each other forward and respecting and loving each other.
					
					 Praising the unit for having successfully built the barracks of the artillery company directly under it with an innovative eye and by introducing everything appreciated by the party as a good one into its construction, he again expressed his satisfaction, noting the barracks is a good icon to be proud of as it meets the requirements of the new century.
					
					 He acquainted himself with the military targets and combat equipment of the artillery company that day.
					
					 He had a photo session with the service personnel of the company after giving them a pair of binoculars and an automatic rifle as gifts.
					
					 He was accompanied by KPA Vice-Marshal Hwang Pyong So, director of the General Political Bureau of the KPA, and Army Col. General Pak Jong Chon, vice-chief of the KPA General Staff and director of its Fire-Command Department.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un Sends Greetings to Choummaly Sayasone
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Sends Greetings to Choummaly Sayasone
 Pyongyang, December 2 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea and first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK, sent a message of greeting to Choummaly Sayasone, general secretary of the Central Committee of the Lao People's Revolutionary Party (LPRP) and president of the Lao People's Democratic Republic (LPDR), on Tuesday.
					 The message extended warm congratulations to Choummaly Sayasone, the LPRP and the Lao government and people on the occasion of the 39th anniversary of the founding of the LPDR.
					
					 During 39 years after the founding of the republic, the Lao people have steadily consolidated and developed the people's democratic system to suit the specific situation of the country and achieved the signal development in all fabrics of the socio-economic life by fully displaying the spirit of patriotism, independence and self-reliance under the leadership of the LPRP, the message said.
					
					 The Korean people are pleased with this and sincerely wish the fraternal Lao people fresh victory in their struggle for adhering to the idea of socialism and bolstering the overall national power of the country, the message noted.
					
					 The message wholeheartedly wished Choummaly Sayasone good health and bigger success in his responsible work of leading the party and state, expressing the invariable will to further develop the friendly and cooperative relations between the DPRK and Laos, true to the noble intention of the preceding leaders and in keeping with the desire of the peoples of the two countries.

articles.title: Pak Pong Ju Greets Lao PM
articles.content:
Pak Pong Ju Greets Lao PM
 Pyongyang, December 2 (KCNA) -- DPRK Premier Pak Pong Ju Tuesday sent a message of greeting to Thongsing Thammavong, prime minister of Lao People's Democratic Republic, on the occasion of the 39th anniversary of the republic.
					 The message said that the friendly Lao government and people would achieve fresh and greater success in the struggle to consolidate the people's democratic system and develop the economy of the country to suit its situation under the leadership of the Lao People's Revolutionary Party.
					
					 It expressed the belief that traditional and good relations of friendship and cooperation between the two countries would steadily grow stronger and wished him good health and success in his work.
					
					 On the day, DPRK Foreign Minister Ri Su Yong sent a similar message to Thongloun Sisoulith, vice prime minister and foreign minister of Laos.

articles.title: Lao Ambassador Hosts Reception
articles.content:
Lao Ambassador Hosts Reception
 Pyongyang, December 2 (KCNA) -- Kiettisak Keobanhdith, Lao ambassador to the DPRK, gave a reception at the Taedonggang Diplomatic Club on Tuesday on the occasion of the 39th founding anniversary of the Lao People's Democratic Republic.
					 Present there on invitation were Yang Hyong Sop, vice-president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, Ri Ryong Nam, minister of External Economic Relations, Cha Hui Rim, chairman of the Pyongyang City People's Committee who doubles as chairman of the DPRK-Laos Friendship Association, and other officials concerned.

articles.title: Choe Thae Bok Meets Russian Ambassador to DPRK
articles.content:
Choe Thae Bok Meets Russian Ambassador to DPRK
 Pyongyang, December 2 (KCNA) -- Choe Thae Bok, chairman of the Supreme People's Assembly (SPA), met and had a talk with Alexandr Timonin, Russian ambassador to the DPRK, who paid a farewell call on him, at the Mansudae Assembly Hall on Tuesday.

articles.title: Kang Sok Ju Meets Russian Ambassador
articles.content:
Kang Sok Ju Meets Russian Ambassador
 Pyongyang, December 2 (KCNA) -- Kang Sok Ju, secretary of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, met and had a talk with Alexandr Timonin, Russian ambassador to the DPRK who paid a farewell call on him, at the Mansudae Assembly Hall Tuesday.

articles.title: WPK Delegation Back Home
articles.content:
WPK Delegation Back Home
 Pyongyang, December 2 (KCNA) -- The delegation of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) led by Pak Kun Gwang, vice department director of its Central Committee, returned home Tuesday after taking part in the Congress of the United Malays National Organization of Malaysia.

articles.title: DPRK Scholar on Truth of S. Korea's Sunken Warship "Cheonan"
articles.content:
DPRK Scholar on Truth of S. Korea's Sunken Warship "Cheonan"
 Pyongyang, December 2 (KCNA) -- Kyunghyang Daily News of south Korea on November 29 carried an article on the truth about sunken warship "Cheonan" of its army.
					 In this regard, Dr. Jong Chol Ho, a teacher of Kim Il Sung University, told KCNA:
					
					 According to the article, a physics professor of south Korea's Kyongsong University and a mechanical engineering doctor of Britain's University of Cambridge contended, in their joint paper contributed to an international scientific magazine, that the warship "Cheonan" might have collided with a submarine.
					
					 The scholars mentioned that the frequency spectrum of earthquake wave, registered in Paekryong Island at the time of the warship sinking, is similar to that of a 113 meter-long submarine's natural oscillation.
					
					 The "Cheonan", made with 1.2 cm-thick alloy of steel and aluminum, went sunken but the submarine, made with high-tensile steel 6 cm thick, was not likely to be damaged, they pointed out, adding that changed shape of the warship's hull was enough to prove the collision.
					
					 The paper recalled the fact that many groups of south Korea had called for a probe into the suspicious collision between "Cheonan" and a U.S. submarine involved in the war exercises around the area of accident.
					
					 The U.S. and the south Korean authorities should open to the public the truth about the "Cheonan" warship sinking case and reveal their dirty colors as a wrecker of peace.

articles.title: Songyong Building Materials Factory in DPRK
articles.content:
Songyong Building Materials Factory in DPRK
 Pyongyang, December 2 (KCNA) -- The Songyong Building Materials Factory, located in Thongil Street here, produces various sizes of plastic tubes and colored metal roofing materials.
					 Its products are very popular among builders for their quality and convenience in use.
					
					 The polyethylene plastic tubes, 20-400mm in diameter, can withstand a 180-degrees temperature. And they have a strong resistance to acid, alkali and shock while preventing furring.
					
					 This plastic tube is 1.6MPa in internal pressure and its serviceable life 80 years.
					
					 The colored metal roofing materials are 0.4-1.2mm thick.
					
					 Choe Nam Chol, manager of the factory, told KCNA:
					
					 My factory's products were welcomed in major construction projects, including renovation of the Songdowon International Children's Camp and May Day Stadium and construction of the Wisong Scientists Residential Quarters.

articles.title: Famous Scenic Beauties in Korea
articles.content:
Famous Scenic Beauties in Korea
 Pyongyang, December 2 (KCNA) -- From long ago, Korea has been well-known over the world for its many scenic beauties. Typical of them are the Korean eight beauty spots, eight beauty spots in the northeastern part of Korea and eight beauty spots in the northwestern part of Korea.
					 The Korean eight beauty spots include Mts. Paektu, Kumgang and Myohyang, Pyongyang area and Pujon Plateaus, said Jo Tae Il, a researcher of the Folklore Institute under the Academy of Social Sciences of the DPRK.
					
					  He went on:
					
					 The eight beauty spots in the northwestern part of Korea are Ryongwang Pavilion in Pyongyang, Inphung Pavilion in Kanggye, Thonggun Pavilion in Uiju, Tongrim Falls, Paeksang Pavilion in Anju, Kangson Pavilion in Songchon, Yaksandongdae in Nyongbyon and Segom Pavilion in Manpho.
					
					 Among the eight scenic spots in the northeastern part of Korea are Lagoon Samil in Kosong County and Chongsokjong, a bluff dense with hexagonal or octagonal rock pillars, in the coastal area of Thongchon County.
					
					 In the present Songun (military-first) era, the Korean people have witnessed new scenic beauties like Sunrise on Mt. Paektu, Sea of Potato Flowers at Taehongdan, Resounding Ullim Falls and Sea of Apples at Foot of Chol Pass.

articles.title: KCNA Commentary Ridicules EU's Bat-blind Behavior
articles.content:
KCNA Commentary Ridicules EU's Bat-blind Behavior
 Pyongyang, December 2 (KCNA) -- Some countries of EU took the lead in cooking up the anti-DPRK "human rights resolution" at the UN, pursuant to Washington's scenario.
					 This is being ridiculed by the international community as a bat-blind act of impairing the image of EU which claimed the establishment of a pole in the world and enforcement of independent policy when it came into being.
					
					 In today's international relations the issue of strictly observing the principle of respect for others' sovereignty and the principle of impartiality presents itself as a fundamental requirement for ensuring the independent development of countries and global peace and security.
					
					 The present situation where sovereignty of various countries is encroached upon and world peace and security are seriously threatened by the high-handed and arbitrary practices of the imperialists strongly urges all countries to remain true to the principle of impartiality in international relations.
					
					 Nevertheless, some countries of EU joined in the U.S.-led fabrication of "human rights resolution", an impudent politically-motivated farce peppered with intrigues and fabrications aimed to encroach on the sovereignty of the DPRK and topple its inviolable social system.
					
					 As known, the UN history does not know such precedent as the fabrication of the half-baked "report of the Commission of Inquiry" on the human rights situation in the DPRK.
					
					 EU must have known that the "report" should at least undergo verification for lots of its drawbacks.
					
					 It should be noted that the DPRK published the report of its Association for Human Rights Studies, reflecting its human rights policy and system for ensuring human rights and the human rights enjoyed by its people, providing an opportunity for EU to verify the former's human rights performance.
					
					 The DPRK, therefore, accepted the visit of the UN "special rapporteur" on the human rights situation in the DPRK and the special representative for human rights of EU to the DPRK and proposed on its own initiative the resumption of dialogue with EU on the human rights issue.
					
					 However, EU suggested having dialogue after the adoption of the "resolution", raising various unreasonable excuses.
					
					 This leaves the international community skeptical about the "independence" of EU.
					
					 Does EU have no self-esteem?
					
					 It is not a secret at present that a U.S. intelligence organ has perpetrated systematic wiretapping espionage against VIPs including heads of state of dozens of countries including Germany called the leader of EU, France and Italy.
					
					 The intelligence organ even planted in secrecy an eavesdropping device at the headquarters of EU in Brussels, a venue of EU summits, regularly snooped on data in computers and telephone networks there and traced out confidential information related to its stand toward international issues and matters of contention among its member states and studied measures for countering them.
					
					 As seen above, EU was stripped by the U.S., its ally, to its skin, but maintained no principle in its approach to the human rights issue, contrary to the common interests of the international community, only to disgrace itself.
					
					 If EU countries are to keep impartiality in dealing with the human rights issue, they should take issue with the crimes of the U.S., the worst human rights tundra in the world, to begin with.
					
					 The DPRK never looks for anyone's "recognition" and, moreover, feels no need to read others' face.
					
					 Anything meeting its people's demand and interests is precisely its standard of human rights.
					
					 It is self-evident that a country can preserve the international justice and the principle of impartiality and develop its relations based on equality with other countries only when it deals with and settle all the issues arising in the international relations with correct criterion.
					
					 The U.S. has applied biased criteria in dealing with international issues, according to its interests, attitude of relevant countries toward it and their political systems.
					
					 Styling itself a "human rights judge", the U.S. has been keen on interference in other countries' internal affairs, pulling them up over their human rights situation.
					
					 The principle of equality and impartially should be thoroughly abided by in the international relations and such acts as interfering in others' internal affairs and forcing a country to accept one's own demand should never be allowed.
					
					 If EU wants to be placed on higher stage as a world's independent pole in the 21st century, it should not blindly follow others in carrying out its foreign policy.

articles.title: S. Korean Puppet Regime Can Never Escape Toughest Counteraction of DPRK: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
S. Korean Puppet Regime Can Never Escape Toughest Counteraction of DPRK: Rodong Sinmun
 Pyongyang, December 2 (KCNA) -- The south Korean puppet regime can never justify its absurd anti-DPRK "human rights" racket whatever reckless actions it may take nor can it escape the toughest counteraction of the DPRK, says Rodong Sinmun in a article on Tuesday.
					 It goes on:
					
					 The regime's smear anti-DPRK "human rights" campaign is an unpardonable reckless confrontational act of negating and antagonizing the ideology and social system of the dignified DPRK.
					
					 Pulling the DPRK up over its "human rights" issue which does not exist nor can exist is not only the negation of genuine human rights but also the vicious challenge to the ideology and social system of the DPRK.
					
					 The regime's frantic "human rights" campaign is the most striking manifestation of the hostile forces' move to isolate and stifle the DPRK getting all the more serious as the days go by.
					
					 It is openly revealing its black-hearted intention to do harm to the ideology and social system of the DPRK by actively joining the U.S. smear anti-DPRK "human rights" campaign to persistently isolate and stifle the DPRK.
					
					 It is desperately resorting to the absurd campaign in league with foreign forces in order to incite the extreme distrust and hostility towards the fellow countrymen and, at the same time, is seeking to shake the revolutionary faith of the army and the people of the DPRK and realize the wild ambition for the unification of social systems. This is the ultimate objective of the regime.
					
					 The south Korean puppet regime is the main target of the toughest counteraction of the DPRK determined to frustrate the frantic smear campaign of the hostile forces.

articles.title: Japan Accused of Joining in U.S. "Human Rights" Racket against DPRK
articles.content:
Japan Accused of Joining in U.S. "Human Rights" Racket against DPRK
 Pyongyang, December 2 (KCNA) -- Leading newspapers here Tuesday in commentaries denounce Japan for its base act of blindly joining in the undisguised U.S. "human rights" racket against the DPRK at the UN.
					 Japan has no qualification to talk about the human rights of the DPRK, Rodong Sinmun says, and goes on:
					
					 Japan is the sworn enemy of the Korean nation as it perpetrated unpardonable crimes by ruthlessly violating the rights of the Koreans from early in the past century just as much as the U.S. did.
					
					 The heinous unethical crimes committed by Japan in the past including sexual slavery for the Imperial Japanese Army and forcible drafting of Koreans are bringing into bolder relief the moral vulgarity of the Japanese reactionaries.
					
					 It has recently been disclosed that the Japanese imperialists mobilized young boys and girls to forced labor under the plea of "juvenile service group" during their occupation of Korea, inhuman atrocities, only to lash the army and people of the DPRK into a great fury.
					
					 Such being a hard fact, Japan has talked about the human rights of the DPRK as a shock brigade of the U.S. in its "human rights" racket against the DPRK. This is nonsensical and just like the guilty party filing the suit first.
					
					 The Japanese reactionaries had better realize that if they continue acting as now without principle, it will disappear from the earth, not just remaining a near yet distant country. 
					
					 Minju Joson says if Japan wants to take part in the international discussion of human rights, it will have to honestly admit its crime-woven history such as human rights abuses before anything else and make an apology and reparation to the Korean people.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Calls for Glorifying Tradition of Victory with Songun Idea and Politics
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Calls for Glorifying Tradition of Victory with Songun Idea and Politics
 Pyongyang, December 2 (KCNA) -- Leader Kim Jong Il was the peerless great man and patriot who glorified the tradition of victory of the great Paektusan nation for decades with his Songun idea and politics, says Rodong Sinmun Tuesday in an editorial.
					 His idea and politics serve as an all-powerful treasured sword which put the dignity of the great Paektusan nation and national power on the highest stage, the editorial says, adding:
					
					 Thanks to the Songun idea and politics, gone are the days never to return when the U.S. imperialists posed threats to the DPRK with the nukes. The dignity of Kim Il Sung's nation and Kim Jong Il's Korea are put on the highest stage.
					
					 His Songun idea and politics are the encyclopedic idea and political mode for the victorious advance of the cause of the popular masses for independence and the socialist cause despite the acute confrontation with the imperialists and constant war threat.
					
					 A main key to highly demonstrating the advantages and might of Korean-style socialism, which capitalism can neither imagine nor get possessed of, and ushering in a new prosperity of Songun Korea lies in thoroughly embodying the Songun idea and politics.
					
					 It is the great pride and honor of our party, army and people to have the great Songun idea and Songun politics which provide a sure guarantee for the eternal victory and prosperity of socialist Korea.
					
					 The editorial calls for glorifying the tradition of victory with the might of Songun, rallied close around Marshal Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Moves to Revise Pension for Public Servants Protested in S. Korea
articles.content:
Moves to Revise Pension for Public Servants Protested in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, December 2 (KCNA) -- Civic and social organizations of south Korea formed the Seoul regional all-people movement headquarters on Nov. 27, according to KBS of south Korea. They included the Seoul Regional Headquarters of the Confederation of Trade Unions, the Government Employees' Union and the Teachers Union.
					 They declared to check the present regime's unilateral moves to retrogressively revise the pension for public servants and pool their efforts for citizen's vital rights.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il Praised by Foreign Personages
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Praised by Foreign Personages
 Pyongyang, December 2 (KCNA) -- Remembrance meetings were held in South Africa, Guinea and Myanmar in the period between November 18 and 25 on the occasion of the third anniversary of demise of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 On display at the venues of the meetings were photos dealing with the noble revolutionary career and immortal exploits of Kim Jong Il and the revolutionary activities of Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The participants offered silent tribute to the memory of Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Bonakele Majuba, secretary of the Mfumalanga Provincial Committee of the South African Communist Party, referred to the fact that he had directly witnessed the reality of Songun Korea making a leap forward under the wise leadership of Kim Jong Il while visiting the DPRK, adding: I extend invariable support to the Korean people in their just cause for global independence.
					
					 Riyad Chaloub, chairman of the Guinean National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea, noted that Kim Jong Il turned the DPRK into a political, ideological and military power by ceaselessly developing in depth the Juche idea founded by President Kim Il Sung and embodying it to socialist construction.
					
					 Lansana Komara, permanent secretary of the Guinean People's Assembly, stressed that Kim Jong Il will always be in the hearts of mankind as he performed great exploits for the Korean revolution and global independence.
					
					 The general president of a publishing house of Myanmar said that the Korean people would surely accomplish the noble cause of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il, holding Kim Jong Un in high esteem.

articles.title: British Organization Observes Demise Anniversary of Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
British Organization Observes Demise Anniversary of Kim Jong Il
 Pyongyang, December 2 (KCNA) -- The British Association for the Study of Songun policy posted a special write-up on its website on Nov. 20 on the occasion of the third anniversary of demise of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 An article praising his Songun leadership exploits was posted on the website, accompanied with photos of him among service personnel of the Korean People's Army (KPA).
					
					 The article said:
					
					 The great leader Comrade Kim Jong Il started his Songun revolutionary leadership by inspecting the Seoul Ryu Kyong Su Guards 105th Tank Division of the KPA on Aug. 25, 1960.
					
					 This was an event of weighty significance which demonstrated his steel-strong will to defend the socialist cause, fighting against the imperialists to the end by force of arms.
					
					 The article recalled that he resolutely foiled the uninterrupted politically-motivated and military provocations including the incident of the U.S. spy ship Pueblo, Panmunjom incident and nuclear crisis in the 1990s, adding:
					
					 The U.S. has gone desperate in its moves to threaten the DPRK by force of arms and stifle it politically and economically after labeling it part of an "axis of evil" and a target of nuclear preemptive attack.
					
					 But the DPRK has become a power possessed of even strong nuclear strike means. 
					
					 This is a great fruition of the extraordinary stratagem and steel-strong pluck of the invincible brilliant commander of Songun Comrade Kim Jong Il.
					
					 He passed away to our deepest regret but his exploits will be immortal along with the successful advance of Songun Korea and the cause of global independence.

articles.title: Egyptian Political Party Leader Praises Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Egyptian Political Party Leader Praises Kim Jong Il
 Pyongyang, December 2 (KCNA) -- Wahid Al Uksouri, chairman of the Arab Socialist Party of Egypt, released a statement on Nov. 26 on the occasion of the third anniversary of demise of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 Not only the friendly Korean people but other progressive peoples and political parties in the world are honoring in the humblest reverence the memory of Kim Jong Il on the occasion of the third anniversary of his demise, the statement said, adding:
					
					 In his lifetime Kim Jong Il dedicated his all to the happiness of the Korean people, development of the Workers' Party of Korea and reunification of the country, and worked heart and soul to achieve the victory of the socialist cause and the cause of independence against imperialism.
					
					 He was, indeed, the greatest man recognized by the world, master of politics and benevolent father of all people.
					
					 An appeal was adopted at the 16th international meeting of communist and workers' parties held in Ecuador on holding memorial events on the third anniversary of his demise.
					
					 The Arab Socialist Party of Egypt will hold memorial events in response to it.

articles.title: Foreign Papers Observe Demise Anniversary of Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Foreign Papers Observe Demise Anniversary of Kim Jong Il
 Pyongyang, December 2 (KCNA) -- Papers of various countries featured articles on the occasion of the 3rd anniversary of demise of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 The Cambodian paper Kmae Amata carried an article titled "Snow and Kim Jong Il" under the bannerline "On the occasion of the 3rd anniversary of demise of the great leader of the Korean people Generalissimo HE Kim Jong Il" accompanied with his photo.
					
					 The paper detailed the undying exploits he performed by making ceaseless field guidance tours, regarding the happiness of the people as his greatest pleasure.
					
					 Kuwait Times in an article accompanied with his photo praised him as the master of independent politics to be specially recorded in the world history of politics.
					
					 Iran Daily devoted its one whole page to an article titled "Great leader Kim Jong Il will be immortal" illustrated with a portrait of the smiling leader and his photos.

articles.title: Appeal of Meeting of Communist, Workers' Parties Supported by Beninese Figure
articles.content:
Appeal of Meeting of Communist, Workers' Parties Supported by Beninese Figure
 Pyongyang, December 2 (KCNA) -- Ali Houdou, president of the Socialist Party of Benin, made public a statement on Nov. 24 in support of the appeal released at the 16th international meeting of communist and workers' parties.
					 Fully supporting the appeal, the president said:
					
					 Leader Kim Jong Il performed immortal exploits before the times and history.
					
					 He left as a legacy the great exploits guaranteeing the eternal foundation for socialist Korea and its rosy future.
					
					 He glorified the Juche idea, Songun idea as the eternal guiding idea of Korea and great guiding idea in the era of independence.
					
					 He developed the Workers' Party of Korea into an ever-victorious guiding force, turned the DPRK into an invincible socialist state and consolidated the Korean People's Army into a matchless army.
					
					 He also paid deep attention to the development of relations with developing countries and African countries including Benin and rendered material and moral assistance to those countries in their drive for achieving independence and building new society.
					
					 Though he passed away, his exploits will always remain in the hearts of progressive mankind.
					
					 We will significantly organize political and cultural events on the occasion of the 3rd anniversary of his demise.

articles.title: Immediate Retraction of Anti-DPRK "Human Rights Resolution" Demanded in Britain
articles.content:
Immediate Retraction of Anti-DPRK "Human Rights Resolution" Demanded in Britain
 Pyongyang, December 2 (KCNA) -- The British Association for the Study of Songun Policy, the British Group for the Study of the Juche Idea and the Korean Friendship Association UK made public a joint statement on Nov. 23 in support of the statement of the National Defence Commission (NDC) of the DPRK.
					 Referring to the fabrication of the shameless anti-DPRK "human rights resolution" at the UN, the joint statement denounced it as a concoction of the U.S., Japan and some countries of EU and other satellite forces.
					
					 "Human rights" issue does not exist in the DPRK guided by the Juche idea and the issue exists in capitalist countries, it said, and went on:
					
					 The U.S. is the world's worst human rights abuser as it kills many innocent people through ceaseless wars of aggression.
					
					 Japan is also a war criminal state as it brutally killed Asian peoples in the past.
					
					 Peoples of some EU countries are living in poverty under the threat of racism.
					
					 The said "resolution" is based on false information provided by those who committed unpardonable crimes before the country and its people and fled to south Korea after abandoning their native places and their families.
					
					 It is quite natural for the NDC of the DPRK to totally reject the "resolution" and declare its toughest counteraction against the U.S. and its followers.
					
					 The joint statement called on all countries and peoples of the world aspiring after independence and justice to defend the DPRK and turn out in the drive to throw the "resolution" into the rubbish heap of history.
					
					 If the UN is to retake its position as an inviolable international body, it should immediately retract the anti-DPRK "human rights resolution."

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Work Carried by Myanmar Paper
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Work Carried by Myanmar Paper
 Pyongyang, December 2 (KCNA) -- The gist of leader Kim Jong Il's work "Socialism Is a Science" was carried by the Myanmar paper The New Age on Nov. 29.
					 The work, published on Nov. 1, Juche 83 (1994), clarifies the idea that Korean-style socialism based on Juche-based theory of socialism is the most scientific and vital one and clearly indicates principled issues arising in defending socialism.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un inspecciona compania de artilleria adscrita a unidad 963 de EPC
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un inspecciona compania de artilleria adscrita a unidad 963 de EPC
Pyongyang, 2 de diciembre (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Primer Secretario del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, inspecciono el dia primero la compania de artilleria subordinada directamente a la unidad 963 del EPC, que comenzo el entrenamiento militar y politico del ano nuevo.
					Primeramente, el Mariscal miro en la sala de leccion el entrenamiento especializado de los militares.
					
					Tras escuchar la pregunta y la respuesta del ejecutor y los militares, converso con los uniformados, ocasion en la cual les enseno los metodos para hacer de la compania unidad de tiro acertado al hacer los ejercicios conforme a las caracteristicas del cumplimiento del deber de combate.
					
					Y presento las tareas programaticas para llevar a feliz termino el entrenamiento del ano nuevo.
					
					El Mariscal subrayo que al materializar estrictamente 4 lineas estrategicas y 3 tareas para el fortalecimiento de las fuerzas militares, todos los oficiales y los soldados del EPC deben preparar como combatientes dispuestos de las estrategias y tacticas invencibles de Kim Il Sung y Kim Jong Il, el modo de ataque audaz y la capacidad perfecta para el combate real y hacer que ellos tengan el aspecto regular del poderoso ejercito revolucionario de flor y nata.
					
					Destaco que todos los comandantes y los militares deben participar en el estudio politico para guardar en el profundo de corazon la consigna de conviccion "No abandone la conviccion revolucionaria aunque muera" y para prepararse como poseedores de la firme conviccion y combatiente de vanguardia que se arremetan con el fusil hacia el unico rumbo indicado por el partido.
					
					Indico que para formar a los militares versados de armas y materiales y equipos tecnicos de combate y dispuestos de arte de tiro acertado hay que librar energicamente los ejercicios especializados y otros de combate en un ambiente de batalla real.
					
					Agrego que todos los uniformados deben intensificar los ejercicios de gimnasio de aparatos para poseer el cuerpo robusto.
					
					Dijo que todos los comandantes deben cuidar con el sentimiento paternal la vida de los soldados de las companias y resolver a tiempo los problemas que se presentan en sus ejercicios y servicios militares, para que ellos se entreguen en cuerpo y alma a los ejercicios.
					
					Refirio que para registrar la innovacion masiva en el entrenamiento, es preciso desarrollar la ofensiva ideologica conforme a la  demanda de la situacion creada, asi que todos los oficiales y los soldados se esfuerzan por alcanzar los meritos militares en la lucha por materializar la orden del entrenamiento.
					
					Acto seguido, el Mariscal recorrio el cuartel de la compania nuevamente construido.
					
					Y dijo que para acondicionar la compania como anorada casa natal de los soldados hay que ofrecerles una vida comoda y la comida abundante,  y agrego que todos los oficiales y los soldados deben tener la camaraderia revolucionaria de ayudarse, respetarse y amarse  reciprocamente.
					
					Se mostro muy satisfecho de que el cuartel de la compania fue construido con la vision innovadora introduciendo lo todo deseado por el partido y es digno y magnifico modelo estandarizado conveniente a la demanda del nuevo siglo.
					
					Ese dia, el Mariscal vio los objetos militares y los materiales y equipos tecnicos de combate de la compania.
					
					Y dio como de recuerdo a los militares de la compania un binoculo y un fusil automatico y se fotografio junto con ellos.
					
					El Mariscal fue acompanado por el vicemariscal del EPC Hwang Pyong So, jefe de la Direccion Politica General del EPC, y el coronel general de las fuerzas terrestres Pak Jong Chon, subjefe del Estado Mayor General del EPC y director de mando de fuego.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un felicita a Choummaly Sayasone
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un felicita a Choummaly Sayasone
Pyongyang, 2 de diciembre (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Primer Secretario del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, envio el dia 2 un mensaje de felicitacion a Choummaly Sayasone, Secretario General del Comite Central del Partido Popular Revolucionario Lao y Presidente de la Republica Democratica Popular Lao.
					El texto va como sigue: 
					
					En ocasion del 39o aniversario de fundacion de la Republica Democratica Popular Lao, quisiera extender mis calidas felicitaciones a Vd., al Partido Popular Revolucionario Lao y al gobierno y pueblo laosianos. 
					
					Durante 39 anos pasados despues de fundacion de la Republica, bajo la direccion del Partido Popular Revolucionario Lao, el pueblo laosiano ha alcanzado un desarrollo trascendental en todos los dominios de la vida socioeconomica consolidando y desarrollando incesantemente el regimen democratico popular conveniente a la realidad del pais y trabajando con el patriotismo, la independencia y la autoconfianza. 
					
					Nuestro pueblo esta complacido de ello y desea de todo corazon que el hermano pueblo laosiano logre nuevas victorias en la lucha por mantener el ideal socialista y aumentar el poderio estatal general del pais. 
					
					Aprovecho esta oportunidad para expresar nuestra invariable voluntad de fortalecer y desarrollar mas las relaciones de amistad y cooperacion entre Corea y Laos de acuerdo con el noble proposito de los lideres antecesores y la aspiracion de los pueblos de los dos paises y formulo sinceros votos por la buena salud de Vd. y mayores exitos en sus responsabilidades al frente del partido y el Estado.

articles.title: Choe Thae Bok se reune con embajador ruso
articles.content:
Choe Thae Bok se reune con embajador ruso 
Pyongyang, 2 de diciembre (ACNC) -- El presidente de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Choe Thae Bok, departio el dia 2 en el capitalino Palacio de los Congresos Mansudae con el embajador ruso en Corea, Alexandr Timonin, quien le hizo una visita de despedida.
